title: Runge窶適utta method (SDE)
summary: In mathematics of stochastic systems, the Runge窶適utta method is a technique for the approximate numerical solution of a stochastic differential equation. It is a generalisation of the Runge窶適utta method for ordinary differential equations to stochastic differential equations (SDEs).  Importantly, the method does not involve knowing derivatives of the coefficient functions in the SDEs.
